statements: SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_certifications;
SELECT product_name, certification_number, energy_rating FROM energy_efficiency_certifications;
SELECT certification_id, product_name, certification_date FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE energy_rating > 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, certification_number FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE energy_rating > 3 ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, certification_number, certification_date FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY certification_date ASC;

SELECT certification_id, product_name, certification_date FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE certification_number LIKE '%CE%' AND energy_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY certification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY energy_rating DESC, certification_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(certification_id) AS total_certifications, AVG(energy_rating) AS avg_rating FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2021-01-01' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_type, certification_date FROM certifications;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Passed';
SELECT certification_type, certification_date, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_type = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT certification_id, certification_type, certification_date, expiration_date FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_id, certification_type FROM certifications WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT certification_id, certification_type, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM certifications JOIN compliance_records ON certifications.certification_id = compliance_records.certification_id GROUP BY certification_id, certification_type;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;

SELECT certification_id, certification_type, compliance_date, compliance_status FROM certifications INNER JOIN compliance_records ON certifications.certification_id = compliance_records.certification_id WHERE certifications.certification_date < '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = 'Valid' GROUP BY certification_id, certification_type, compliance_date, compliance_status ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyCertifications;
SELECT product_name, certification_date FROM EnergyEfficiencyCertifications;
SELECT certification_id, certification_body FROM EnergyEfficiencyCertifications WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT authority_name, contact_email FROM RegulatoryAuthorities;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyCertifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, certification_date FROM EnergyEfficiencyCertifications WHERE certification_body = 'ABC Corporation';
SELECT e.product_name, r.authority_name FROM EnergyEfficiencyCertifications e JOIN RegulatoryAuthorities r ON e.certification_id = r.authority_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT MAX(compliance_date) AS latest_compliance_date FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE certification_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT appliance_name, efficiency_rating FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE inspector_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT agency_name, website_url FROM certification_agencies;
SELECT certification_id, appliance_name, efficiency_rating, certification_date FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE efficiency_rating < 3.0;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_certifications;
SELECT appliance_name, efficiency_rating FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5;

SELECT appliance_name, certification_date, compliance_status FROM energy_efficiency_certifications JOIN compliance_records ON energy_efficiency_certifications.certification_id = compliance_records.certification_id;

SELECT certification_id, appliance_name, inspector_name FROM energy_efficiency_certifications LEFT JOIN compliance_records ON energy_efficiency_certifications.certification_id = compliance_records.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_certifications WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT organization_name, certification_status FROM organizations WHERE certification_status = 'approved';
SELECT certification_agency_name, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM certification_agencies GROUP BY certification_agency_name;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM products WHERE product_type = 'electronic';
SELECT * FROM energy_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT certification_agency_id, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM energy_certifications GROUP BY certification_agency_id HAVING total_certifications > 10;

SELECT certifications.certification_id, products.product_name, organizations.organization_name FROM energy_certifications AS certifications JOIN products ON certifications.product_id = products.product_id JOIN organizations ON products.organization_id = organizations.organization_id;

SELECT organizations.organization_name, certification_agencies.agency_name FROM organizations LEFT JOIN certification_agencies ON organizations.certification_agency_id = certification_agencies.agency_id;

SELECT compliance_records.record_id, certification_agencies.agency_name, energy_certifications.certification_type FROM compliance_records JOIN energy_certifications ON compliance_records.certification_id = energy_certifications.certification_id JOIN certification_agencies ON energy_certifications.certification_agency_id = certification_agencies.agency_id;
